summary: This module contains a suite of unit tests that validate the behavior of the Litellm routing utilities. The tests cover callback execution on request success or failure, calculation of remaining usage for model groups, verification of router settings, handling of wildcard routes for model group usage and information retrieval, proper propagation of model group headers, and preprocessing of keyword arguments before fallback mechanisms.
business_intent: To guarantee that the routing layer of the LLM service correctly manages callbacks, usage accounting, configuration exposure, wildcard routing, header handling, and fallback preparation, thereby ensuring reliable and accurate request routing and resource tracking in production environments.
